summary: knowledge transfer of Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV) involves the dissemination of created/acquired information on MERS-CoV in hospitals. the study evaluated the perceived effectiveness of educational programs and knowledge transfer among primary care HCWs at a hospital in Saudi Arabia in 2016. less experienced HCWs were 2.1[1.3–3.5] times and 4.9[2.6–9.2] times more likely to exhibit negative perceptions of the two outcomes (adj. P 0.001 each) supplementary material is available to authorized users.
